info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: bo.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 302 
Connection: close
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Language: en
Date: Wed, 15 Jun 2022 02:09:02 GMT
Expires: 0
Location: https://bo.dossierfacile.fr/login
Pragma: no-cache
Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=FBF040CCDEFF7402BFF454D89E107878; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 ; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Security-Policy: script-src 'self'
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Request-Id: 9ccf1ae2-0635-4d5a-b2fe-f403821ad0db
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Length: 0

info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5965
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;bo.dossierfacile.fr.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 5965
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;bo.dossierfacile.fr.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
bo.dossierfacile.fr.	300	IN	CNAME	dossierfacile-bo-prod.osc-secnum-fr1.scalingo.io.
